issue.title: [Urban Feature] Access to simulation robot logfile?

content.raw:
Hello Nate,

thank you for the update. Note, that this feature would be a good example where we could test it on AWS as “pre-release alpha version” and not endanger new teams \(see #256\), if we could select CloudSim image from multiple options \(stable and testing for example\).

thank you

Martin
content.html:
Hello Nate,

thank you for the update. Note, that this feature would be a good example where we could test it on AWS as “pre-release alpha version” and not endanger new teams (see #256), if we could select CloudSim image from multiple options (stable and testing for example).

thank you
